name: Inspiration Field
description:
When your character uses a Skill: This Skill deals +2 additional DMG. After the Skill DMG is finalized, if this character's HP is not greater than 6, heal this character for 2 HP.
Duration (Rounds): 2
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When your character uses a Skill:</color> This Skill deals +2 additional DMG. After the Skill DMG is finalized, if this character's HP is not greater than 6, heal this character for 2 HP.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>
